text: This section describes the Standard Upgrade Procedure from Mediationzone Version 9.3.x to 9.4. Refer to Upgrade Overview for information on upgrading across multiple versions. Ensure to read through all the documentation for the Standard Upgrade Procedure and check out the Release Notes for Important information and Known Issues before proceeding with the Upgrade. Ensure that you follow the instructions in the order outlined in this section. This section has the following subsections: Pre-Upgrade: Upgrade Preparations Steps Pre-Upgrade: Shutting Down Workflows and Desktops Pre-Upgrade: Disconnecting ECs from the Platform Upgrade Platform Container Upgrade Execution Container Post Upgrade Steps
title: Standard Upgrade Procedure - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
